sentences.english: Whose would be man , must be a nonconformist .
sentences.chinese: 任何一個真正的人都肯定是不落俗套的人。

sentences.english: Spontaneity is one of the key elements of creativity.
sentences.chinese: 自發性，不落俗套就是創造性中最關鍵的因素。

sentences.english: What I specially like about the oil-painting is its originality.
sentences.chinese: 我特別喜歡這幅油畫的地方是它不落俗套。
